mapper.select: SELECT `task`.*, users.name as name, users.head as head, users.school as school FROM task LEFT JOIN users ON task.uploader = users.id WHERE (task.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchContext}, '%') OR task.context LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchContext}, '%')) ORDER BY task.create_time DESC
